cont.entity_a: Projects sound well in large rooms. Allows clear hearing across a room. Better than laptop speakers but not a replacement for a home stereo. Good for streaming audio, speech, and movies. Sound quality depends on media quality.
cont.entity_b: Sounds great at both lower and higher volumes. Sound quality is better than 2.1 Creative and 2.1 Logitech speakers. Great sound with DVDs encoded in DTS/THX. Sound does not distort at high volume. Speakers provide great sound for gaming. Speakers have good quality of sound for the price. Sound quality is clear at high levels.

cont.entity_a: Lower frequencies are not as great as with a subwoofer. No woofer for bass. Bass makes speakers vibrate on high frequencies.
cont.entity_b: Loud and deep bass. No issues with too much bass. Sealed woofer design reduces distortion. Powerful bass. Too much bass requires adjustment. Explosions are loud and shake the desk in games.

cont.entity_a: Light and easily fit in a laptop case. Comes with a decent zippered pouch for traveling. Carrying case is solid but not easily portable.

Power.comm: USB-powered, no additional power cable needed.

cont.entity_a: Single USB connection frees up the headset jack. Connect to a laptop with a USB cable; no power cord needed.

Media controls on the speaker are convenient and work well. Controls are small and close together, hard to operate. Volume controls are knobby push buttons. Sound level is hard to adjust due to small buttons.
cont.entity_b: Limited sound control besides volume and superbass. Corded volume control is convenient. Corded remote controller. No treble control.

cont.entity_a: Solidly built and durable. Lasted 10 years before breaking.

cont.entity_b: Requires a 5.1 capable sound card for full experience.

cont.entity_a: USB cable is only about 18 inches long. Cords allow for a maximum separation of three feet. Wires are cumbersome depending on computer connections.
cont.entity_b: Wired with short cords. Rear speakers have long cords. Rear speaker wires are too short.

cont.entity_a: Very good sound for the money. Expensive for the type of speaker.
cont.entity_b: Speakers are great for the price.

cont.entity_a: Performed well with MP3 playback, movie watching, and Talk Radio. Can hear GPS voice clearly in a car.
cont.entity_b: Works well with gaming or regular computers. Exceeds expectations when connected to TV.
